entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in AnalyzerDriver #74315
    17.12
  • Building twice in VS is broken. #74314
  • A delegate type synthesized by compiler can refer to an inaccessible type #74312
    Backlog
  • Wrong type with Concat and litteral collection [] #74309
  • Add SymbolDisplayFormat parameter to TypedConstant.ToCSharpString/ToVisualBasicString #74304
  • Change bootstrap framework CI leg to be consistent with SDK #74303
  • Hitting Debug.Assert in the compiler (TypeWithAnnotations.cs) #74297
    17.12

Closed

  • Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing flaky on MacOS #61474
    17.4
  • Collection Expressions: Extra array copy when spreading `IEnumerable<T>` to `Span<T>`. #74292
  • Test plan for "method group natural type improvements" #69432
    17.12
  • Test plan for "interceptors" #67421
    .NET 8
  • Test plan for "collection literals" #66418
    .NET 8
  • CSC hangs for 20 seconds when run with /shared argument on .NET SDK 8.0.200 #72180
  • IDE0031: Null check can be simplified. Fix doesn't work if accessing a property wrapped in unnecessary parentheses. #74273
    Backlog
  • ArraySegment<T> s = []; leads to wrong initialization #73738
  • CallerMemberName doesn't recognize local functions #72095
  • Having two embedded resources dependent on the same file causes CS1508 error #73735
  • Conversions to restricted types are not disallowed in expression trees #74143
  • .NET 9 `Preview.5`, `Preview.6`, `Preview.7` C# compiler crashes on LINQ expression with string interpolation #74163
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35108.50 #74296
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35108.150 #74295

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove fallbacks (3) #74323
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [WIP] Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP #74320
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks (2) #74319
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Use more precise wording for errors specifying requirements for types that can be used in a `using` statement. #74311
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • SpillSequenceSpiller – preserve `ref` BoundConditionalOperator in presence of spilling in its either branch #74310
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Avoid more large string constant fields #74307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion (#73844)" #74302
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Note that toolset package layout is hard-coded in SDK #74301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move determination of language for an LSP request into the serialized queue to avoid race #74300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Testing build issues #74298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74318
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove fallbacks #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix UseNullPropagationCodeFixProvider for parenthesized property access #74316
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Disable BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler #74299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid using constants for large string literals #74305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust lowering of a string interpolation in an expression lambda to not use expanded non-array `params` collection in Format/Create calls. #74274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Consolidate test Span sources #74281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix returning valid pp symbol info on unrelated preprocessor directives #72910
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • With project info #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not include collection expression conversion to nullable value type in ClassifyStandardImplicitConversion() #74251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid reporting redundant and possibly misleading WRN_InlineArrayNotSupportedByLanguage #74283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Additional tests for `ref struct interfaces` feature #74282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Allow services to use System.Text.Json for OOP comms in Razor #74280
